content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to have you here. I'm sure we can come to an agreement that suits us both. How much were you thinking of offering for the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student, so I am on a tight budget. I was thinking of 300 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my asking price. I'm looking for at least 500 euros per month. Is that something you can consider?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite a gap between our offers. How about we meet in the middle at 400 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: No, I can't accept 400 euros per month. It's not fair to the other potential tenants who are willing to pay more. I'm not being greedy; I'm just trying to get a fair price for my property. How about 450 euros per month? That's already a compromise on my part.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still quite a bit higher than I can afford. How about 425 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 425 euros per month is not enough. I'm willing to negotiate, but I need at least 450 euros per month to cover my costs and make a decent profit. Do you have any other offers?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, I don't have any other offers. But I can pay 4 months of rent in advance to compensate for the lower price. How about that?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I'm not interested in receiving rent in advance. I'm looking for a tenant who can pay the full price of 450 euros per month. If you can't afford that, I'll have to find someone who can.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. How about I pay 450 euros per month, plus 50 euros for furniture? Since the apartment is unfurnished, I would need to buy furniture to live here.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't have any furniture to offer, but I'm willing to rent the apartment to you for 450 euros per month if you agree to that price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 450 euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Great, Max! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The apartment will be yours for 450 euros per month. Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
